short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track the percentage of a YouTube video that has been played.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Title: YouTube Percentage Tracker

Description:
Track your progress while watching YouTube videos with the YouTube Percentage Tracker extension. Always know how much of the video you've watched and how much is remaining. Stay informed about your video consumption and manage your time effectively.

Key Features:
- Display the percentage of the video played in real-time.
- See the remaining time of the video.
- Simple and unobtrusive user interface.

Why Use YouTube Percentage Tracker?
- Stay organized: Easily manage your time by knowing how much of a video you've watched and how much is left.
- Smart tracking: The extension works seamlessly, providing accurate progress information for a better viewing experience.
- User-friendly: A clean and minimalistic interface ensures a distraction-free experience.

How to Use:
1. Install the extension.
2. Open a YouTube video.
3. Click on the extension icon to view the progress and remaining time.

Note: This extension respects your privacy and only operates on YouTube pages.
